description: Horatio`s Cinccino participated in the Pok√©mon World Tournament Junior Cup at the Kagome Town stadium. In the first round it was in the fourth match and faced off against Simeon`s Zebstrika. The match quickly showcased Horatio`s Cinccino finishing off Simeon`s Zebstrika with Giga Impact to win the battle which allowed Horatio to advance to the second round while Simeon was eliminated from the tournament.
name: Chillaccino (Akihiro)
